Script.name: voteWoTMUD
Script.script: function voteWoTMUD() local last_vote={} if io.exists(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/last_vote.lua") then table.load(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/last_vote.lua", last_vote) else last_vote.time=getEpoch() end if getEpoch()-last_vote.time>86400 then cecho("<red>It has been over 24 hours since you voted!\n") cecho("<red>Type \"vote WoTMUD\" to vote now.\n") end end
